name: mitula
tag_list: search, vertical-search, trovit, nuroa, nestoria, indeed, careerjet, classified-ads, aggregator, traffic, lead-generation, content-affiliation, content-sindication, homes, property, holiday-rentals, jobs, vacancies, candidates, cars, motorbikes, trucks, c
overview:
Mitula is a vertical search engine for classifieds. Find and filter jobs, property and cars from all major online media and portals.

Mitula was launched in January 2008, following a five-year process of design, incubation and development. It was conceived as an alternative traffic source for online classifieds media.

For portals, classified boards and online newspapers it complements standardized listing and positioning in search engines by offering an additional method to mine their visitors. For Internet users it presents an alternative to the way they search and access relevant information on the web, and allows them to have a bird’s eye view of all options available.

Mitula’s founders are three Internet visionaries with 17+ years of experience in the online business. After more than a decade devising the technology and working on the potential of vertical search engines, Mitula’s founders became passionate (if not obsessed) about developing an aggregator.
